ABOUT US AND OUR TEAM

Welcome to San Marcos Orthopedics, where expert care meets compassionate service. Our team of dedicated orthopedic surgeons here in Central Texas is committed to providing personalized, high-quality care to enhance your musculoskeletal health. With a focus on innovation and patient well-being, our surgeons bring years of experience and expertise to the field of orthopedics.

We understand that each patient is unique, and our approach is tailored to address your specific needs. Whether you're seeking relief from joint pain, recovering from an injury, or exploring surgical options, we are here to guide you on your journey to improved mobility and a better quality of life. Our goal is to provide the patients of Hays and Comal counties the most advanced and up to date surgical techniques, making exceptional orthopedic care accessible and close to home. As the team physicians for Texas State University, our medical expertise has been trusted by athletes at the highest levels of competition.

At San Marcos Orthopedics, we pride ourselves on fostering a patient-centered environment. From the moment you enter our clinic to the completion of your treatment, our team is dedicated to ensuring your comfort and satisfaction. Explore our website to learn more about our skilled surgeons, the services we offer, and how we can partner with you on the path to orthopedic wellness.

Our experienced medical professionals put your healing needs first. We are proud to provide a high quality level of customer service, medical experience, and commitment to health and wellness to all our patients. Our goal is to make you feel better as quickly as possible.
